A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke’s line from the trailer\, “this isn’t going to go the way you think” was right on the money. This movie takes risks\, and spins a lot of the common tropes associated with the series on their head. The Last Jedi is a wild ride start to finish\, I’m going to have to watch it a few more times before I give it a ranking in the saga. One thing is for sure\, I can’t get it out of my head.
